checksum error: Error - Did you try to add a directory ?
checksum missing: Please provide a checksum to check against
delete check question: Are you sure to delete this check?
file missing: Please add a file to check
tooltip save checks: Your checks are getting saved into a small database, so you can always remember them
tooltip save check clipboard: After the checksum has been computed it is saved to your clipboard
upload text: Click or drag to insert a file
upload hint: Please insert only files and not directories
